DOC.detailed_description: Preterm infant recruit consecutively NICU Mansoura University Children 's Hospital . They randomize two group ; one group start nasal CPAP ( Fisher & Paykel Healthcare , Auckland , New Z ealand ) ( Pressure 5 cmH2O ) 60 minute switch HHHFNC ( Fisher & Paykel Healthcare , Auckland , New Z ealand ) ( flow 4 l/m ) another 60 minute . The group start HHHFNC switch nasal CPAP . After 2 h study period ( 2Ã—60 minute epochs ) respiratory support discretion clinical team . Ultrasonographic assessment diaphragmatic dimension excursion analyze different respiratory cycle average 3 cycle calculate end 60 minute period nasal CPAP HHHFNC .
DOC.criteria: Preterm infant < 37 week . Stable nasal continuous positive airway pressure ( CPAP ) least 24 hour . On less 35 % oxygen . Congenital acquire problem gastrointestinal tract necrotizing enterocolitis , esophageal perforation tracheoesophageal fistula . Phrenic nerve injury and/or diaphragm paralysis Congenital/acquired neurological deficit and/or seizures Hemodynamic instability Congenital heart disease ( include symptomatic patent ductus arteriosus ) Undergoing treatment sepsis pneumonia . Use muscle relaxant , narcotic analgesic , gastric motility agent . Congenital anomaly respiratory tract . Infants require 35 % oxygen . Infants facial anomaly . Infants pneumothorax and/or pneumomediatinum . Infants immediate postoperative period . Infants significant gastric residue vomit .
